cleaned_text: On application of the Meso Color Light Needle Roller 500 micro needles glide over the skin, puncture same and open micro channels of the top layer of the skin. As the needles are ... I calm the skin on your feet and sootheinflammation. I have a light texture and disinfect with micro-silver and tea tree oil. My menthol refreshes your feet and prevents the smell ... Our Color Energy Detox Set contains the SOFRI Life Bath (500 g). With sea salt and Himalayan salt, this bath promotes the elimination of acids and metabolic waste products through the skin. The Color Energy Waterome Harmonizing Synergy (50 ml), is a water-soluble, plant-based essential oil synergy of the highest purity and quality, for a soothing foot or full bath. With the Color Energy Chlorella Detox Purification Capsules, you can support the elimination of harmful substances from the body. They are packed with natural vitamins such as B2, B3, B6, B9, B12 and E, as well as manganese, phosphorus, various amino acids and omega-3 fatty acids. The whole thing comes in the SOFRI Beauty Bag (19 x 17 x 7 cm).
